feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar usage of hyphens, colons, commas, and quotation marks.

feature2.explanation: There is consistency in lexical and grammatical choices across both texts.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structures and lengths are comparable, showing coherence in writing style.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share common expressions and idiomatic usage, indicating a similarity in tone and mood.

feature5.explanation: There were no apparent spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
